entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is the mother of Lily and sister-in-law of James Potter. She is described as having a relish in sending her children to a special school for freaks.

entities.name: snape boy
entities.description: The Snape boy is referred to as a 'weirdo' by Petunia and is implied to be attending the same school as Lily.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is the daughter of Petunia and sister of James Potter. She is described as having a fierce tone when speaking to her mother.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is the brother of Lily and husband of Petunia's sister.

entities.name: headmaster
entities.description: The headmaster is a position at the school that Petunia wrote to and begged to take her in.

relationships.description: Petunia refers to the Snape boy as a 'weirdo' and implies she knows him.
James Potter is the husband of Petunia's sister.
Lily saw a reply from the headmaster after her mother wrote to him.
